value.halfverse: sing to the LORD, all the whole earth.
value.verse: Sing to the LORD a new song; *

value.halfverse: proclaim the good news of his salvation from day to day.
value.verse: Sing to the LORD and bless his Name; *

value.halfverse: and his wonders among all peoples.
value.verse: Declare his glory among the nations *

value.halfverse: he is more to be feared than all gods.
value.verse: For great is the LORD and greatly to be praised; *

value.halfverse: but it is the LORD who made the heavens.
value.verse: As for all the gods of the nations, they are but idols; *
Oh, the majesty and magnificence of his presence! *
value.halfverse: Oh, the power and the splendor of his sanctuary!

value.verse: Ascribe to the LORD, you families of the peoples; *
value.halfverse: ascribe to the LORD honor and power.
bring offerings and come into his courts.
value.verse: Ascribe to the LORD the honor due his Name; *

value.halfverse: let the whole earth tremble before him.
value.verse: Worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness; *

value.halfverse:
he has made the world so firm that it cannot be moved;
 he will judge the peoples with equity.”
value.verse: Tell it out among the nations: “The LORD is King! *

value.halfverse: let the field be joyful and all that is therein.
value.verse:
Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad;
let the sea thunder and all that is in it; *

value.halfverse: when he comes to judge the earth.
value.verse:
Then shall all the trees of the wood shout for joy
before the LORD when he comes, *
He will judge the world with righteousness *
value.halfverse: and the peoples with his truth.
